name: The Distillery Winter Village
description:
Come out to Toronto's most iconic Christmas market!

Our cobblestone streets are transforming into a twinkling winter wonderland once again, with charming market cabins ready for their yuletide debut, our magnificent 55-foot silver fir standing tall, and our team gearing up to welcome you back for the most magical time of the year!

name: Dufferin Grove Organic Farmers' Market
description:
Welcome to the Dufferin Grove Farmers' Market, where fresh fun meets community spirit! This vibrant market is all about inclusion and celebrating cultural diversity, especially as food prices rise. 

The Dufferin Grove Park has hosted a year-round farmers' market since November 2002, making it one of the longest-running in Toronto. With ten stalls full of organic goodies from vendors committed to sustainable practices, you can enjoy delicious bites while caring for the planet. It's all about accessibility and healthy eating, making it a go-to spot for food lovers. Come join the excitement and discover nature's bounty!

name: European Union Film Festival
description:
Presenting 28 outstanding films from 28 countries, taking audiences on a cinematic journey across Europe, this year's selection showcases multiple award-winning films, literary adaptations, directorial debuts and the largest representation of women's stories to date.

Connect and explore a wide range of themes, representing Europe's rich social, cultural, and historical diversity through a variety of film styles and genres. From picturesque landscapes to modern settings, from stories of resistance to tales of family reunion, transgenerational journeys, and political reckonings, we invite you to gather in a place of community and celebration: the movie theatre!
